LongDescription: Disabled status means a physician has demonstrated to the Board the inability to practice medicine due to a disability and requested a waiver of the renewal fee. A physician on disabled status cannot practice in the State of California.
Practice is limited to military service including military dependents.
License is in retired status and the licensee is exempt from payment of the renewal fee. No practice is permitted.

A voluntary service physician licensee whose initial and/or renewal license fee has been waived pursuant to Business and Professions Code sections 2083 and 2442 must comply with the continuing medical education (CME) requirements.
